skill.name: execute-plan
skill.tagline: Execute written plans step-by-step with built-in human verification gates
skill.summary: This skill helps you implement written plans by loading them and executing tasks in sequence. It includes automatic verification steps and will pause for human approval when needed. The skill stops immediately if it encounters blockers or unclear instructions rather than guessing.

workflow.mermaid:
graph TD
    A[Start: Load Plan File] --> B[Execute Next Task]
    B --> C{Task requires human verification?}
    C -->|Yes| D[Stop & Ask for Human Approval]
    D --> E{Get Feedback}
    E -->|Approved| B
    C -->|No| F[Mark Task as in_progress]
    F --> G[Follow Steps Exactly]
    G --> H[Run Verifications]
    H --> I[Mark Task as completed]
    I --> J{More tasks?}
    J -->|Yes| B
    J -->|No| K[Plan Complete]
    E -->|Changes Needed| F
    subgraph "Stop Conditions"
        L[Missing Dependency]
        M[Test Fails]
        N[Unclear Instruction]
        O[Critical Plan Gaps]
        P[Repeated Verification Failures]
    end
    B -->|Encounter Stop Condition| L
    L --> D

steps.name: Load Plan File
steps.description: Read and load the written plan file to understand what needs to be executed

steps.name: Execute Tasks Sequentially
steps.description: Process each task in order, marking progress and following steps exactly as written

steps.name: Run Verifications
steps.description: Perform verification checks as specified in the plan to ensure correctness

steps.name: Request Human Verification
steps.description: Pause execution and ask for human approval when tasks require verification gates

steps.name: Handle Feedback
steps.description: Apply changes based on human feedback and continue with execution

principles: Follow plan steps exactly without skipping verifications
Stop immediately when blocked and ask for clarification rather than guessing
Reference other skills when the plan specifies to do so
